title: Pantanos de Villa Wildlife Refuge Tour in Lima
description: This Pantanos de Villa Wildlife Refuge tour in Lima is the ideal tour for animal lovers. See the diverse range of creatures that live in the coastal areas of Peru, including Peruvian pelicans, Andean coots, fish, reptiles, amphibians, and more. Exploring the area with a guide takes the guesswork out of spotting wildlife, as you’ll be taken to areas where different species have been spotted before.
all_descriptions: This Pantanos de Villa Wildlife Refuge tour in Lima is the ideal tour for animal lovers. See the diverse range of creatures that live in the coastal areas of Peru, including Peruvian pelicans, Andean coots, fish, reptiles, amphibians, and more. Exploring the area with a guide takes the guesswork out of spotting wildlife, as you’ll be taken to areas where different species have been spotted before.
McDonald's, Av. Oscar R. Benavides 140 Miraflores, Cercado de Lima, Miraflores 15074, Peruoutside the Miraflores McDonald's
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.
provider: TripAdvisor, yet the driver didn't know where to drop us off.  While stopping to ask for directions multiple times, we missed the boat and got placed with another provider.

reviews.title: A varied and interesting birdwatching habitat, with a focus on conservation and education
reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic experience. The guides were brilliant. We were accompanied by Manuel, who was passionate and knowledgeable, despite having only been there for a short time. Saw around thirty birds which were new for me in a few short hours, including some incredibly close. Highlights included vermilion flycatchers, many coloured rush tyrants (who are apparently sometimes difficult to spot, but were incredibly obliging for us), Wilson's phalarope, Harris hawks, and many more. Also heard, but not seen, was the very shy least bittern.I'd like to thank again our fantastic guides, who offered not only knowledge of the local wildlife, including insects, spiders and snakes, as well as birds, but also insight on the people and area (in multiple languages as well)  Great value for money and a wonderful birdwatching experience. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Birding with a guide at Pantanos de Villa
reviews.text: I went on a private birding tour of Pantanos de Villa with Nicole.  She was highly knowldgable and knew where to find my target birds including the Many-colored Rush Tyrant, Peruvian Meadowlark and the Plumbeous Rail. There was also a very nice driver so Nicole and I could focus on the birds.  I was picked up promptly at my hotel and delivered back to the hotel.

reviews.title: Tranquility near the City
reviews.text: The tour was a nice diversion from the hectic city. Nicole was very knowledgable about the birds and we learned a lot. An enjoyable morning!

reviews.title: Great birding guide, a real treat!
reviews.text: Jorge was a great guide. Kind and well-educated. Very knowledgeable about birds. Could ID by audio on most occasions.Added 19 new species to my life list today! About 58 in total for the day, wonderful!Jorge was also very engaged with the public, who may or may not be as invested in protecting the natural area. But you can see how his passion enables him to inform people and enlist them into the values of conservation.The boat tour as well was a special way to experience the humedal (brackish swamp). It would not have been possible to enter this park during birding hours without his bona fide guide credentials.Some favorites: the many-colored rush tyrant, Peruvian pipit, Peruvian meadowlark, burrowing owls, Peruvian thick-knee, Chilean Flamingo, and Great Grebe!

reviews.title: An excellent birdwatching guide
reviews.text: Jorge was an excellent birdwatching guide and worked hard to help me find my target birds in Pantanos de Villa and surrounding areas. He was very knowledgeable and great company. My family enjoy nature but would be bored with a typical birdwatching trip, but Jorge did a great job at making sure everybody was having fun. Recommend wholeheartedly.

reviews.title: Great tour, lots of birds!
reviews.text: Jorge was an amazing guide. Very personable and knowledgeable. He helped me prioritize seeing the birds I wanted to see and talked about other wildlife in the area. Cannot recommend this tour enough!

reviews.title: Birding
reviews.text: Nicole was a very knowledgeable  guide. She had the names of the birds in english & she spoke with very good English.We were picked up & dropped back to our hotel on time.WeWould definitely use her again.

reviews.title: Peaceful morning tour
reviews.text: Nicole was an excellent guide. Very friendly and knowlegeable. It was lovely to get away from the bustle ofLima to enjoy nature, see wildlife, and view the beach. I highly recommend this tour.

reviews.title: So many birds! Nicole is a great guide!
reviews.text: Nicole is so knowledgeable and friendly. I had a wonderful time talking about birds and finding many different species with her. The extra cost of the boat trip was absolutely worth it. I saw my first baby coot in the wild! The location is really neat, with varied habitats and many different kinds of birds. Totally worth the time and money! Thank you so much Nicole!

reviews.title: Overpriced
reviews.text: The description & prior review are pretty accurate; our guide did their best & we did see about 25 birds in the 1st part (boat for 3 was 12 Pen  ~US$4 extra) & saw thousands of birds on beach.  With 1000s of birds bring closed, old shoes as you will come back with evidence of 1000s of birds.  Only port a potty available in each location.  Trip was less than 4 hours including transportation to & from Isidro hotel but could have been longer if we took more photos or had others with us—it was just my husband & I.
